titleInfo.title: Equation of state and other results of finite T lattice QCD with quarks

mods.abstract: The talk in brief summarizes some recent results of lattice QCD in the high temperature regime. The topics discussed are the present knowledge about the phase transition including its critical temperature, the equation of state and thermal hadron masses.
